findings.title: RenounceOwnership is not in accordance with specifications
findings.description: The function renounceOwnership inherited from OpenZeppelin's Ownable.sol could render the token frozen for minting/burning and the controller contract no longer upgradeable, increasing the attack surface.

findings.title: Upgrading logic for Members.sol and Factory.sol may lead to inconsistent state, and does not allow for re-use of state / data
findings.description: Inconsistent state and inability to reuse data/state when upgrading Members.sol and Factory.sol due to storage of member list and wallet data.
